faq.title: FAQ — Quality Tools in Manufacturing
faq.a1: A Check Sheet is a structured QC table used to collect frequency of defect occurrences directly from manufacturing processes.
faq.a2: A Pareto Diagram is a QC chart used to identify vital defect causes that contribute to 80% of quality problems.
faq.a3: In industrial quality, a Histogram is used to visualize distribution of measurement data such as dimension, thickness, or tolerance deviation.
faq.q4: How do I upload data from Excel?
faq.a4: Click 'Upload Excel' and select a sheet containing columns for categories and counts.
faq.a5: No. Your QC data never leaves your browser. Nothing is uploaded.
faq.q6: Is this tool free for industry use?
faq.a6: Yes. The platform is 100% free for engineering, industry, students, and research purposes.
faq.q7: Is this tool usable on factory floor tablets?
faq.a7: Yes. QC Tools is responsive and can be used on mobile or industrial touchscreen terminals.

about.title: About QC Tools
about.purpose_desc: QC Tools was created to provide practical, high-accuracy data analysis for real industrial environments, lab research, process improvement, production inspection and engineering education.
about.background_desc: The tools are based on established quality methodologies used in real factories — including Six Sigma, SPC, MSA, Lean and ISO-based monitoring systems.
about.design_desc: The interface is designed to match industrial QC environments — clean layout, high contrast, functional structure, with minimal UI noise.
about.credit_desc: Developed for the quality community: students, factory users, engineers, and industrial professionals.

privacy.title: Data Privacy
privacy.p1: QC Tools never transmits any data outside your device.
privacy.p2: All calculations and processing happen locally in your browser.
privacy.p3: No personal identity or credentials are requested.
privacy.p4: No analytics or hidden telemetry runs in the background.
privacy.p6: All results should be treated as internal QC documentation.

footer.description: QC Tools provides industrial-grade quality analysis supporting students, professionals and real manufacturing environments. Used globally in quality control applications for accuracy, speed and reliability.

highlight.scalable_desc: Mampu menangani kebutuhan data QC yang terus bertambah, mendukung ekspansi produksi dan analisa defect yang lebih besar.
highlight.secure_desc: Seluruh pemrosesan dilakukan secara lokal di browser. Tidak ada upload ke cloud. Cocok untuk lingkungan manufaktur dengan data rahasia.
highlight.fast_desc: Analisa instan tanpa delay — dioptimalkan untuk inspeksi kualitas real-time di lantai produksi.
